website_summaries.verdict: This furry, squeaky toy will be your cat's new best friend.
pros: There are a number of fun animals to choose from
Squeaking noise is enticing, and movement is seamless
Toy is durable and easily withstands being tossed and pounced on
cons: Toy is quite small, making it easy to misplace

customer_reviews.title: Quality Fun toy for pets
customer_reviews.text: I'm a foster mom for abandone kittens. This toy Does NOT fall apart after heavy ,longterm use by 4 cats and a chihuahua! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: katherine  c  malheiro

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy for kittens! My Two Boys Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: My two 12 week old kittens LOVE these! I'm pretty sure they think the skunk is "real" prey because they both start growling at each other if the other kitten gets near "their" dead skunk! 😂 The toy feels like real rabbit fur (may feel like a skunk, but I've never had the opportunity to pet one...lol). The toy is only about 3 inches long, so they carry them wherever they go and one of the kittens hides his. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia cott

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed one hour after arrival
customer_reviews.text: We bought the bird version of OurPets Play-N-Squeak. It does not make bird-like sounds, just little electronic beeps. The sound is OK but our pet completely destroyed this toy in less than one hour, so we will not be buying this brand again. I compare it to the "Gigwi Interactive Cat Toys" which lasted four months before our pet destroyed that one. I highly recommend Gigwi.
customer_reviews.author: Tirebiter 88011

customer_reviews.title: Great kitten toy
customer_reviews.text: They LOVE it! Quite realistic as well. Tiny but great for small baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize item was so small only two inches. Not much for sound. I pulled the tab, nothing. I had to cut it open to remove the rest of the tab, then activate the squeak, then sew it closed. The cat doesn't even play with it. Was a waste of money. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when activating sound
customer_reviews.text: My cat had another fox toy like this one and loved it. So when the first one wore out, got stepped on, etc. I replaced it with the same toy fox. However, when I tried to pull the string to activate its sound device, it pulled out and the sound was not activated. Disappointing for both me and my cat. Still it is a toy which takes a lot of play (unless of course you accidentally step on it! Ha!)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Not the same item
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is not what was pictured. It's still OurPets, but the packaging is wrong, the tail is completely different, as is the body/legs. Looks like the fur is made of different material. It might squeak, but I haven't tried it as I am returning it. Says "includes catnip" but I beg to differ. Didn't smell like it at all. (Cat confirmed, I let her sniff it. No interest.) I also don't know where the catnip would be, it's a very small toy and the entire body is filled up by the squeaker mechanism and it's all sown shut.
customer_reviews.author: L. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great Squeak!!
customer_reviews.text: Miss Izzy loves her squeak toys! She was an outside (stray) kitty in her previous life, so any chirp, squeak, peep intrigues her. I had a Play-and-Squeak mouse from about 7 years ago that still worked, so I can speak to the longevity of the battery. She has several of these now that are “stashed” all over the house. I had to travel with her, so I packed one in her carrier. It “chirped” during the vibrating phases of take off and landing, which I noticed left near-by passengers slightly puzzled.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.jones55

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit, my kitties love these chirp toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bunny on a whim because it was seriously too cute. I’ve ordered different motion activated noise toys before and had them be quite unresponsive to movement (as if the battery was already dying) but these work really well and chirp at the slightest movement. The bunny is adorable as well and my cats took to it right away, also my boyfriends dog (a chihuahua) seemed to love it as well! It’s very small and perfect for my cats, like the size of a small mouse. Loved it so much I ordered another bunny rabbit and the raccoon too. I recommend these toys!
customer_reviews.author: detroitbunny

customer_reviews.title: No Squeak - on original purchase or the replacement they sent
customer_reviews.text: I received this bird affixed to a piece of cardboard, pulled out the clear tab so that the internal battery makes contact, then it squeaked twice and never again. Now no squeak. I asked for a replacement and guess what? Again, no squeak. These must all be so old that the batteries are all dead.
customer_reviews.author: N. King

customer_reviews.title: My cats' favorite toy but far too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these toys! I have the raccoon, the bunny, the bird, and the skunk. For some reason, they do not like the skunk. Their favorites are the raccoon and the bunny. However, they are now $14 and $15 respectively, which is a joke. I paid less than $4 for each of these toys and would happily buy more to add to my large collection of them, but not at nearly 4x the amount! Price gouging at its finest with these tiny toys!
customer_reviews.author: ExpertShopper10001

customer_reviews.title: Skunk is small, squeaks LOUD
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely small, a little bigger than a Syrian hamster (only comparison I can think of), and doesn’t seem like it would put up with much hard play. My cat doesn’t care for it too much, but that’s nothing wrong with the product and on my picky cat. Does squeak LOUDLY, so there’s that, and squeaks whenever bumped or tapped. Overall, it seems like a decent toy, my dude just doesn’t care for it. Might see if my parents cat likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Isa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Little Floofy Rabbit
customer_reviews.text: My cat used to have a chirping bird toy that he was obsessed with for a time but he did become uninterested in it after awhile. I wanted to get him something new, and came across this rabbit. It. Is. Adorable! This bunny is super tiny with a fluffy cottontail and the cutest little bunny ears. It is the perfect size to bat around or carry in a cat's mouth and extra fun to pounce on because of the squeaky sound it makes. My cat loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Smile SaurusTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lightweight squeaky toy for kitties!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty absolutely loves this toy! This is actually the second that we've bought for her, because the other one is looking extremely sad after all the abuse she's put it through. The squeaker is less loud than the last one we bought (which we are definitely *not* complaining about) and I'm not sure about this one, but the squeaker on the last was definitely NOT waterproof... Someone liked to throw it in the water dish.
customer_reviews.author: Elyssa Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but cat is annoyed by it sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes my cat loves playing around with this and attacking it. Has a lot of fun with it as well..however sometimes my cat is just absolutely annoyed by it. The chirping noise is just too fast. I think it would be better if it was just a tad bit slower. It also ripped pretty quickly. Has a hole in it from my cat playing with it after a few weeks. Regardless it's still a toy my cat plays with every once in a while and for the money it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy,kitten approved
customer_reviews.text: The first one I order had the mechanism broken, likely a heavier box was placed over the envelove in transport, and the manufacturer packaging is only a piece of carbord tied to the toy. Amazon kindly replaced it. My kitten enjoys them both. for pushing,kicking,carrying dropping... you name it. The sound is very soft "squee" when kicked around. My kitten has a similar toy, shaped like a rubber duck,that produces a much louder sound. Of course he likes the duck better, but since can get annoying after 30/40 minutes of playing I much prefer this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it okay
customer_reviews.text: The toy is cute and small. It's a bit louder than I would prefer. Half my cats like it and the other half don't. I wish they had this one as a non-squeaky version, I think my cats and myself would have liked a quiet one better. But this was the only cat skunk toy I could find; I was trying to replace an old favorite of my cats skunk toy. Way over priced for the product though, not really worth the price plus shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Holdaway

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this thing has held up!! Just make sure you hide it when you're going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy. The cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of their favorite toys. It "cheeps" with very little movement, the feathers haven't come off, and for $4 and no catnip it's pretty remarkable. They've figured out it's not a real bird so they don't always attack it, but it always gets the their attention. Dangle it on a string and I bet your cat will go nuts. I ordered another bird and the skunk.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: My cat goes crazy over it!!! 😻
customer_reviews.text: Took my cat a minute to figure it out but omg she loves it. Haven't seen her this excited about a toy in a while. Hard to take a good video while playing with her but you can see that she picks it up with her mouth and carries it. It's only been a day so I can't comment on the durability. The only negative thing is that when you take it out of the packaging, those little plastic T shape things stay stuck in the toy itself. I trimmed them as close as possible but I'm worries about them falling out later.
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Cats favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This brand of cat toy is my cats absolute favorite. We used to get a orange bird and she went through 3 of them, eventually breaking the noise box from carrying it around and throwing it up in the air! Got this new design and was afraid she wouldn't accept the replacement... But as soon as she heard the familiar squeak she perked right up and ran over to it. She hates every other toy, only this brand will do.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rufo

customer_reviews.title: Picky kitty who also wants to play ALL the time loves this
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Makes cute chirping sound without being overly annoying - Good value - Kitty can be self-entertained by it and gets out his need to chase things - He took to it immediately, no building up familiarity to it Cons: - Much smaller than I expected but turned out to be ok for him anyways - Not sure how to change the battery if it runs out? Overall: Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: hsa

customer_reviews.title: My cat loved throwing the skunk in the air and catching it
customer_reviews.text: I got a skunk and a mouse at first. My cat loved throwing the skunk in the air and catching it. The mouse was too heavy for the throw-and-catch game. Now that the skunk is dead, I got him a fox and a bird. He still loves the fox way more than the bird. Since my cat has been having non-stop fun with the fox, I'm placing another order for a rabbit and a raccoon. A collection of happiness indeed!
customer_reviews.author: StreamingJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: This was a great toy for my cat because it makes noise and it is easy to throw and for him to carry. Only problem is, this toy is SMALL. Like, about 2 inches small. I wanted something a little larger for him to really play with. He likes it, so I can't really give a bad review. And it's a $4 toy, so I can't complain about that either.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marie

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so tiny , and junk . Only squeaked once . My hubby tossed it in trash . I was so upset w him ..I HAVE PRIME .. oh u live and learn . Kong has the best toys
customer_reviews.author: Bunny’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Maybe, But Depends on the Cat
customer_reviews.text: It squeaks and my cat is almost interested in it. I was really hoping for something he would be interested in playing with without me, but this wasn't the toy. When I sprayed it with catnip he went crazier for it than his mice toys, but not by much. Maybe if your cat is really into these types of toy's they'll love it, but for me it wasn't really worth it. My cat usually likes wand toys and I can kind of make him go for mice when I throw them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn and Ed

customer_reviews.title: Best cat toy
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying different cat toys for our new kitten. He gets bored easily but is very active so I needed to find a toy that keeps his attention. This toy was exactly what he needed! The chirping sound catches his attention and he loves batting it around. Hopefully the battery lasts since it doesn't look like it can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Boo Boo Kitty, loves this!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty will play a lot with all his little toys, but I find he will look for this one, since it is easy for her to get in her mouth and she will carry it around and when we go to bed, she will often go find it to bring with her.... Couldn't find at the pet store, spent six months trying to find this. Great to be able to locate on AMAZON !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t going to write a review, but my cat LOVES THIS TOY!! It’s super cheap, it chirps like a little bird when she plays with it, and it lasts a long time. She has played hard and this little thing has zero damage. It’s her go to anytime she gets bored. If you want to keep your car from getting bored, this is the cheap and best way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the ones that go "peep" when they're jostled (as opposed to song ones). My cats love these. They're durable with normal use but one of the cats has a habit of putting toys in the water dish which ruins the voice box after a few times. They'll survive it once or twice after drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Elster

customer_reviews.title: Looked 2nd hand
customer_reviews.text: Makes a sad little noise. Nothing like a squeak. The packaging for other Play-N Squeak toys had the strip you remove to get it to work. This one the strip was already removed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Brown

customer_reviews.title: It won't shut up!
customer_reviews.text: It won't shut up! One cat likes it, the other cat is scared of it...go figure. Last night I heard this steady squeeking and I said to myself....myself, what the heck is that!?...it sounds like that new cat toy....it was....and NO cats were around, it was going off by itself.....it---still---is! Emailed Amazon and they promptly refunded my money. I LOVE Amazon, their customer service is second to none. You are probably wondering what happened to the little cat toy.....I have it stuffed in a jar under a towel in my laundry room. Whenever the battery runs down, hopefully soon, it may make a good cat toy.....maybe.
customer_reviews.author: George of North Florida Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Both my adult cat and I love that this toy makes a sound. She likes the added life-like effect. I like it because she does, but also because even if I'm in another room, I know she's playing with it. I'm considering buying a handful and leaving them around for her surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P. Combs

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Though it is so small (much smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Though it is so small (much smaller than I expected) it gets lost under bookcases, and means I have to retrieve. That being said, Jeffy the 15 year old cat LOVES it. He hasn't played like this since he was a kitten. When he is tuckered out, he sits and looks at it while talking to it. I am absolutrly going to have to hide it at night. I'm surprised it works, since it arrived squished inside a plastic envelop. I'll update the review when I see how long the noise lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Frostfire

customer_reviews.title: Great if the battery is fresh
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several of the play-n-squeak toys. Two foxes came with the battery protector missing. Very disappointed since batteries are not replaceable. The squirrel was the instant hit and ongoing favorite. It's small, light, and extremely soft. A satisfying toy for kitty to carry around and throw for himself.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Has A Real Squirrel Friend But...
customer_reviews.text: My male cat has a little squirrel friend “Peanut.” He comes to visit and they see each other through the glass. He loves his new Christmas toy (one of them) and it squeaks so he’s deliriously happy, and so I am also happy! Happy Cat-Happy Life! Well, you know what I mean...:)
customer_reviews.author: Desert Summer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, cat destroyed it easily
customer_reviews.text: While my cat did love this toy, I cannot recommend it and think it is probably dangerous. He ripped the squeaker out while I was at work and I have no idea where it is. I hope he did not swallow it. Do not leave your cat unattended with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: The fake fur is very soft and the squeaker works fine without being too loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought the raccoon and the skunk for my nine month old cat. I only removed the squeaker tab from the raccoon for now. At the beginning, she was not interested at all. However after tossing it to her a few times she played with it! Tossing it in the air and pawing at it and grooming it, she seems to be enjoying it. The fake fur is very soft and the squeaker works fine without being too loud. I would recommend for anyone whose cat likes light soft toys. Be warned though that the raccoon is very small, the skunk is slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great for teacup yorkie
customer_reviews.text: So difficult to find toys small enough and sturdy enough for her. She came in one day with a small toy, that when washed appeared to be a cat toy and she loved it. This was also a big hit with my other puppy a shih-poo at 8pounds. Great price also!
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was a little scared of this toy at first, but once he got used to it, he loves to play with this bird! He bites hard and it’s still intact so I’d say it’s pretty durable. I’ve had it for at least a month now. I love how it doesn’t require batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it and it’s a great price
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE the noise this thing makes. I pulled it out of the package and immediately my younger cat grabbed it from my hands and ran to play with it. It even gets the older cat moving with its squeaks. Only had it a few weeks so not sure how durable it will be but hopefully will last a fair amount of time. Great price. Don’t leave it in your bedroom at night because the cats will make it squeak under your bed at 3:00am.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Lee

customer_reviews.title: Squeaker doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: The squeaker in this toy is hit or miss. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. Sometimes it starts squeaking and it doesn't stop until you tap it repeatedly. There's not a whole lot of stuffing around the mechanism that produces the squeaking so it's a very hard in the middle. It is cute tho.
customer_reviews.author: Schatzi35

customer_reviews.title: Holy smokes!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this toy. And he has A LOT of toys. This is his favorite, I had to buy another one because he loves it so much that he frequently loses or misplaces it. It does make noise so if that kind of thing bothers you then put it away at night, because your cat will love smacking that thing back and forth for hours! It's hilarious to watch him chase and stalk this toy mouse as if it were real. He turns into a kitten again! It's a great inexpensive toy compared to pet store prices and I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Better than a live mouse in my house
customer_reviews.text: My cat has the bunny and the fox. She loves the squeak, which i assume mimics real prey sounds. She will pounce on them. abuse them, and carry them to her "lair". They have held up well. No visible damage. She seems satisfied with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: gingergal

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like that the toys are small - not overly sized and off putting to the cats. The squeek sound is pleasant and my cats seem to perk up intetest as soon as I opened the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it said it would be
customer_reviews.text: My cats were startled by the noises at first - they haven’t had a squeaky toy before, but they had fun batting it. It’s tiny and cute. I got the bunny. The noise was high pitched and repetitive like an annoying bird but cats are kind of annoying sometimes too so oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Non-stop play
customer_reviews.text: Our cat absolutely loves his rabbit. Usually he does not play long with his toys but he has non stopped play with it and hunted it for the last 15 mins. He loves that it makes the little chirp sound. Highly recommend for your cat.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Pal
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is specifically about this rabbit toy, but my bengal cat absolutely adores it. She has three of them, and she carries them around the house, talking to them and including them in her day to day activities. She'll often place these rabbits around her food bowls or in her carriage so they're with her when she spends time outside on the deck. I highly recommend these toys. Just be forewarned-- they are noisy and are not pleasant at 3 AM. So be certain to keep them under wraps once it's bedtime, or else you'll probably find yourself hearing them chatter in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert Pupkin

customer_reviews.title: Fun sound
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my doxin dog. He loves the chirping sound. Do not leave a dog unattended with this toy. Its not durable for any chewing. My dog loves to fetch them and when he looses interest i put them up until next time.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Webb

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy to add to the collection
customer_reviews.text: My one cat loves to play with it and my other is indifferent playing with it but will sit and groom the toy. It’s very small and cute. My one cat likes it enough that if this one was damaged I would buy another. The chirping sound intrigued her and gets her excited when we drag it around the floor to get her in a playful mood.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: The toy keeps him entertained so we're both satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ording a few more of these because of how much my boy kitten loves them. As soon as the package was opened he ran and jumpes on the critter. He loves rolling around and carrying it across the living room. The toy keeps him entertained so we're both satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Adorable
customer_reviews.text: The noise this thing makes is akin to those old chicks from easter as a kid where you put your finger on the two metal points and it chirps. This thing chirps as soon as you move it in any way. Honestly I put cat nip all over it and my cat slobbered all over it and then put it in a hidey spot. I hear it chirp sometimes at night but I haven't heard it in a while now.... it's pretty dang cute though, and the cat definitely played with it a lot at first. Cheap and adorable, but the chirp -- beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kay B.

customer_reviews.title: squirrel has silky fur and squeaking sound is very pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, I should probably stop buying toys for my cat as she prefers her favorite Dollar Store mouse and used yellow padded envelope to anything else in the world. Those cats.. :) But her humans really really like this squeaking squirrel. The sound it makes is very pleasing even in big doses :) and even in the middle of night :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The beepy toy must die!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of our two cats goes absolutely bonkers for these, which is awesome and cute during the day. I do recommend hiding it from them at night, though. We found that that beeper does die eventually, so we've had to replace them after about 6 months of play. It's been helpful to have spares in a drawer in the winter - if the current favorite is lost, our cat's cabin fever makes him a little destructive towards other toys!
customer_reviews.author: Just a Reader

customer_reviews.title: Slightly annoying for humans, but my cats are thrilled
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. I however, do not love wake up in the middle of the night due to the chirping noises and growls of my cats play hunting... But as long as they're happy...
customer_reviews.author: Val Kilmer's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. He’ll carry it around the house after he’s gone wild playing with it. The sound went out after a year but he still plays with it. I will be purchasing another. Well worth it and then some!
customer_reviews.author: cat¢¾dog¢¾bunnyperson

customer_reviews.title: Picture is misleading
customer_reviews.text: I bought the skunk toy because of the long fluffy tail on the picture but the actual toy has no long fluffy tail, just a little white nubbin on the bottom. It's made well but my cats have not shown an interest in it yet
customer_reviews.author: J. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Looked nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our new kitten since she was loves toys that makes noise. Got it in the mail and it looked nothing like the picture. There was no tail, and it was so cheaply made. The only reason it was not sent back was because she saw it and stole it while it was still attached to the package.
customer_reviews.author: CantBelieveItsNotMargirine

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be a cat toy but is now a dog toy
customer_reviews.text: Cats have no interest in this but our new puppy just loves it! The squeak gets him going and he chews on it and tosses it around. I am in shock it is holding up as he is a super chewer lab. Bad buy for cats but great buy for puppy!
customer_reviews.author: WinterHyena

customer_reviews.title: First toy that my cat has liked for a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is the first toy I've bought for my cat that has held her interest for weeks on end. I now have two (one for upstairs and one for downstairs) and she still enjoys playing with them. So far both are intact and still squeak in spite of many weeks of being tossed and batted as she plays. She will spontaneously begin playing with the toy, as well as responding if I pick it up and toss it for her. Its nice that it entertains her when the humans are busy and can't play as well as when they can.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Toy On The Planet!
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best toy that I have ever purchased. My over-zealous almost two year old cat loves it. I picked it up and it was saturated from her licking it. She will play for hours and I often find it out in the hallway while she has tried to score a goal under the door! I am ordering twenty to donate to my local Humane Society. I will always have spares on hand as only God knows where she will hide this. Every cat on the planet needs this toy! ADDENDUM: Received the twenty toys and donated them to the Wisconsin Humane Society. They were thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Michele A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Catnip
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this little guy. I took it out of the packaging and wrapped it with some treat bags for a little gift. My cat went crazy for it as soon as I opened it. She loves catnip and apparently toys that squeak. I couldn't even get the little pin out that prevents noise before my cat had it between her jaw!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to Squirrel
customer_reviews.text: My baby boy Buddy is OBSESSED with his squirrel. He is always ready to play fetch with it and goes HAM playing with it solo too. It’s his favorite toy ever. He likes to dunk it in his water bowl and brings it to us totally soaked to throw. This thing gets thrown hard and far, kicked around, and drenched on the daily. To say it’s sturdy is an understatement. This is the second one I’ve bought. The first one was a hand-me-down from a friend that my older cat played with for almost 4 years until Buddy took it over. These things last and are cat approved!!
customer_reviews.author: Fariha A.

customer_reviews.title: christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift I know you want a in-depth review of it inner works and how its enrich my life and brought my family closer together or how I get laid more. uh nope read the next one Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A favorite with our cat
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my cat's favorite toys. He carries it around proudly like he caught the bird outside himself. This is a great you because it makes noise,so it sounds realistic when they play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but, a tad pricey for just one
customer_reviews.text: I foster kittens and have had a lot experience with cat toys. These always go over well but, not necessarily any more popular than a less “fancy” toy. I ordered a few of these when they where around $3 a piece so I’m happy with it. If your cat like a larger quantity of toy options, you may be better of with a less pricey variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Stinky in a way kitties don't like
customer_reviews.text: We have a few of these electronic squeaking toys and my cats love them. Not this one. Despite rolling him in catnip, I can only convince them to run after it if I throw it. They won't touch it. I'm guessing it's the weird plasticky smell. My kitties aren't usually picky about toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Sielesnew

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it but small
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love you his little guy. Seems bigger in the picture but it's pretty small. Looks like a small bird and sounds like one too. Our kittens are about 5 months old and loves the darn thing lol
customer_reviews.author: MrsKam

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun and Reliable Product - Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: Cats absolutely love this squeaky toy - the squeak is still functioning and the animal covering remains intact. Nice that a very light tap or a slight movement of the "raccoon" occurs... all I have to do is sometimes pick it up and the cats come to attention and run to chase it and toss it around. Also bought the OurPets Play-n-Squeak Mouse and they like that one even better - I think it's the darker shading or slightly different shape. If I ever buy cat toys again, these Play-n-Squeak ones have proved very appealing to the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Else-Marie T.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how small it was. Kitten sort of likes it and would play with it if we were playing with it. Dog likes it more tho. Honestly would not have bought it if I saw it in person.
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: This toy is a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, this toy is such a hit with our cats! The first night I opened it and left it on the floor, they found it within an hour. It makes the cutest sound and our youngest cat, the hunter, will bat it around day and night. I was looking for something to keep her a bit more occupied and this has done the trick. I wonder if the other ones make a different sound? If so, I would buy another one. I'll have to check.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Animals loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cay, who seemed to want to play with it. However, my Wheaten terrier found it so exciting that he stole it from the cat and eventually bit it and destroyed it. Yet it was great to see this old dog so excited!
customer_reviews.author: coloringfanatic

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this! Walks around house with it in her mouth. Chases it when I throw it. Worth the money. Falling apart but to be expected with as much play time she has gotten out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Skunk with Spunk
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what it is about this skunk but my kitty loves it. It’s a very derpy toy and chirps loudly every time it’s thrown around. It is the perfect toy to keep any kitty entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE toy for your cat OR your dog!
customer_reviews.text: Whether it's your cat or your dog or both who love squeak toys this rabbit is absolutely precious, I got it for my cat for Easter, and it has a nice fur texture and is small for cats but little dogs will like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the skunk. It's a sweet little toy and definitely squeaks - freaked me out in the middle of the night a few times! So I suggest ordering it but putting it out of reach at night. Great deal, the cats get a kick out of it & play with it often.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy, however it is a toy that requires ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy, however it is a toy that requires some work. You can not leave this toy out when you sleep. It WILL wake you up. Also once the battery starts to run down the thing started squeaking non-stop. I probably could've disabled it, but in a fit of grumpiness I basically disemboweled it. I'm still giving it five stars because all of that is just what the toy is, and the kitties love it. So it's worth the effort...for the kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Evans

customer_reviews.title: Much fun was had by cats.
customer_reviews.text: I put this out for the cats, and almost immediately heard a lot of chirps and squeaks as they hunted it around the house. The chirping has now stopped and the toy has disappeared. I think I will find it in the basement, where all old cat toys are taken to be chewed. I don't know if you can put these through the washing machine, but I guess we'll find out.
customer_reviews.author: Clothes Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Kitten just loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is holding up well. My kitten gets pretty rough with it and it looks great. The squeaker in holding up well also. Nice toy! I have the bird also, they are both great.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan customer

customer_reviews.title: Good squeaks for all.
customer_reviews.text: Cat really likes it. Bats it around and chases after it. Even the dog wants a piece of that toy. The only thing that could make this better is a loop to tie a string to. That way we can tie it to a wand and make a fishing game out of it. This toy seemed to be decently made being it lasted one play session session with the cat and a few bites from the dog--small toy dog. Not for medium or large dog, they may choke on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Your cat will ignore you!
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect my cat to immediately befriend this thing and forget about all his other toys... He even forgets about us when he sees this lil skunk... TEN OUTA TEN!
customer_reviews.author: Some guy...

customer_reviews.title: My two kittens both love this toy
customer_reviews.text: My two kittens both love this toy. They stay entertained by it longer than other toys because it makes a noise when they hit it (so if they keep hitting it, it keeps squeaking, making them want to keep hitting it). Other toys don't interest them because they have to work harder to make it interesting. This toy is definitely worth it if you want something they can play with on their own, without you having to throw it around for them.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: A great cat toy
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a hurt baby bird. My cat absolutely lives this little toy! He attacks it and carries it everywhere and also sleeps with it. Definitely getting my money's worth
customer_reviews.author: Coaches wife

customer_reviews.title: Makes my cat more active in play
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this toy. Because she’s so into the speaking noise, she can’t stop playing with it and it giving her more exercise because of that. Totally worth the price would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Durable with squeaks for attacking
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 cats and most of them have happily attacked and tossed this "birdie" about. Their "birdie" has NOT fallen apart and NONE of the feathers has come out. It is a durable toy that keeps on squeaking
customer_reviews.author: Constance R Mays

customer_reviews.title: Reminds our cat of her first murder.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat Penny just made her first kill a few days ago. The bird she murdered looks exactly like this toy. She LOVES this. Every time it squeaks, it's as if she's snuffing the life out of that little Tweety Bird all over again. Death is love.
customer_reviews.author: RoseNgo

customer_reviews.title: Chirpy, realistic new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was slightly cheaper, but my cats are obsessed. I have 3 cats and all have been carrying it around and playing with this toy! It even chirps. One of the best cat toys I've purchased
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn S

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy
customer_reviews.text: My younger cat loves it. After getting it wet in her water dish several times and finally submerging it, it no longer squeeks. She killed it. She still plays with it. On the negative side, it's very small and easily lost.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy but sound on my bird won't turn off
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the plastic battery tab on the toy as soon as it arrived this morning. It started chirping and would not stop. There is no way to disable the sound or pull the battery. It is currently wrapped up in a heavy blanket waiting for the battery to eventually drain. I assume it will work fine as a small noiseless cat toy when the sound is finally eliminated.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C.

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves this!  Squeak noise happens at every bat.
customer_reviews.text: I just adopted a cat - who was found at the zoo. He is acclimating well and has been using all of the toys he can find around the house. So I wanted to buy him something that was more engaging since he appears to be a 'mouser' - this toy was literally just delivered a couple of hours ago and he hasn't stopped playing with it. I had to hide it because the squeaking was getting on my nerves! But its great! The toy squeaks when they touch it, so be prepared for the constant noise coming from the toy. consider yourself warned.
customer_reviews.author: Cololloby

customer_reviews.title: Loved by our cat. Even before I activated the sound.
customer_reviews.text: My adult cat went after the toy before I could remove it from the cardboard grabbed it and ran off with it, I removed it from the cardboard and activated the sound and threw it to him and he pounced on it and was trying to kill it. It's his new favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: theodore Richard

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made!
customer_reviews.text: It looks larger in the picture which almost made me not buy it. It is actually about mouse size and very tightly put together. Usually these toys get ripped open or seams pop or the material is thin but I was pleasantly surprised! My kitten it very active and pounces and chews on this toy with a lot of vigor. It is thick, plush and makes a mouse like squeak a lot. Its just plain awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Walker

customer_reviews.title: It's Love It or Hate It
customer_reviews.text: My cats hated it. I got tired of scaring myself half to death by kicking it as I made my way through a darkened room and gave it to my mom for her cat. He loves it! He spends hours rolling and "bunny kicking" it. He loves it so much that my brother now hates it because the near-constant chirping bothers him. So, depending on your cat, it might be a hit or miss. Hearing my mom giggling on the phone as she watches "Moe" in hunter mode stalking and wrestling it and annoying my brother made it worth it for me, even if my two babies wanted nothing to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves her birdie
customer_reviews.text: My cat immediately thought it was real and started flipping around with it. I wish I could post her video it is hilarious but my cat loves her bird and how real it feels and chirps
customer_reviews.author: Amberli CatLadi

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and cats love it, Great for indoor cats who still need to hunt!
customer_reviews.text: The cats love this. One in particular thinks it's real. First she attacks and bats it around, then she mews at it and carries it around in her mouth. Then she grooms it and lays on it. After a bit she pokes it, it squeeks, she assumes she hasnt killed it, so the whole thing starts all over with batting and tossing it in the air. She wont share it. May have to buy more! It works perfectly and has a very realistic squeek. So much so that it will need to go nite-nite in the closet alone at bedtime so Mom can get some sleep without hearing small animal murder ( fake of course) occuring into the wee hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was sent in an enveloppe without protection Therefore did not work. I received a dead squirrel Do not waster your money unless you want a dead animal
customer_reviews.author: evelyne r. roche

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves this bird toy!
customer_reviews.text: Small sturdy bird toy, life like with chirping upon motion/touch. My kitten loves to hunt this toy, licks and attempts to pluck the feathers. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Clutter

customer_reviews.title: Loud chirping
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend putting it away at bedtime so you don't hear it chirping in the middle of the night. Kinda loud. Impressed my cat hasn't chewed it up. Made well. Cats enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Saspa

customer_reviews.title: Happy Maine Coon Cat!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old Maine Coon, who is bored to tears in the temporary housing we are living in. THIS wonderful, SMALL, "squeak" toy is just what she needed to keep her busy. She is able to pick it up in her mouth and run with it. So far, after four days, the "tail feathers" (or rabbit tail) have stayed in place - pretty good for a 14 lb. cat! I HIGHLY recommend this product for cats of all ages. NOTE: Due to size, these will get under every piece of furniture in the house - have a broom handy :-)
customer_reviews.author: Conniec

customer_reviews.title: Chirpy little critter is Kitten's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This little critter is so darn cute I almost didn't give it to my kitten! However, she loves playing with it and will carry it all over in her mouth. She does the little chirpy talk as she runs all over carrying this with her teeth. Good price. Good product. I WILL buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

product_meta.title: OurPets Play-N-Squeak Backyard Interactive Cat Toy (Cat Toys for Indoor Cats with Catnip & RealMouse Electronic Sound)[Cat Plush Catnip Toys,Catnip Toys for Cats,Interactive Cat Toys for Indoor Cats]
product_meta.description: Style:RaccoonThe OurPets Backyard Bird encourages physical play and mental stimulation by appealing to your cat’s natural instincts. Your cat is ensured an instinct fulfilling play experience by providing them with a toy that has a tactile feel, an enticing RealMouse sound, and a catnip scent. All the fun for your cat with no catnip mess. Keep them entertained for hours and try multiple products from the backyard collection to see which animal your cat likes best!
feature_bullets: INTERACTIVE CAT TOY: The OurPets Backyard Collection Cat toys encourage physical play and mental stimulation by appealing to your cat’s natural instincts. Your cat is ensured a fulfilling play experience by providing them with a cat toy that has an enticing Real Critter sound and a catnip scent

REAL CRITTER ELECTRONIC SOUND: Play-N-Squeak cat toys feature an electronic sound module that, when batted, makes a realistic squeaking mouse sound, providing safe, indoor prey and fueling your cat's desire to stalk and chase

MENTAL & PHYSICAL STIMULATION: Cats need mental stimulation from play to keep from being bored and to fulfill their hunting instincts. Physical activity from play acts as a workout, keeping cats physically fit and enriches the pet’s quality of life and fosters a healthy relationship between the pet and their parents

RELIEVES STRESS, ANXIETY & BOREDOM: Play provides more than just exercise. Play also relieves anxiety, stress, and boredom. When indoor cats do not have toys to play with, that is when they supplement their playful instincts with anything they can find around the house; curtains, toes, shoelaces, etc
CATNIP FILLED: Plush is filled with enticing catnip so there is no mess. Great for cats of all ages

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
